tutorials.title: Register your local machine to SSH into Sessions
tutorials.description: Set up your local machine for SSH access to connect to your Shakudo sessions, enabling development remotely on your local machine.

tutorials.title: Link to a new Git Repository
tutorials.description: Connect to multiple Git repositories and access your code in Shakudo workloads

tutorials.title: Dify for beginners: Build a RAG chatbot with LLMs
tutorials.description: Build an LLM chatbot with RAG for PDF files using Dify

tutorials.title: Dify advanced: Build a RAG agent with LLMs and your vector database
tutorials.description: Build an LLM agent with RAG for Markdown files using Airbyte, MinIO, Qdrant, Dify, and Shakudo microservices
